kubejs.ponder.tag.getting_started.descri: Making sense out of tech and magic!
kubejs.ponder.creepersteel_block_craft.t: Exactly four goldsteel blocks should be placed in area adjastent to the TNT.
The explosion will then convert them to creepersteel block.
The creepersteel block spawns right in the origin of explosion.
If amount of goldsteel blocks isn't four, the conversion won't happen.
kubejs.ponder.creepersteel_block_use.tex: Creepersteel blocks are a good explosive
They are triggered by redstone. Strength of power defines strength of explosion
Minimal power input provides TNT-like explosion. Maximal input results in charged creeper-like explosion
Maximal explosion drops mob skulls just like charged creeper explosions
kubejs.ponder.goldsteel_ingot_crafting.t: No matter the amount of goldsteel blend, it'll always successfuly convert into goldsteel ingots.
